body_html:
So to summarize the issue:
If you are Linux GPU Python 3.5 user, and you go through "Installation" section on https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow and click the appropriate link, you will not get the nightly, but instead you will get a month old version.
body_text:
So to summarize the issue:
If you are Linux GPU Python 3.5 user, and you go through "Installation" section on https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow and click the appropriate link, you will not get the nightly, but instead you will get a month old version.
body:
So to summarize the issue:
If you are Linux GPU Python 3.5 user, and you go through "Installation" section on https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow and click the appropriate link, you will not get the nightly, but instead you will get a month old version.
